long_description: Design geeks, rejoice! The women's Chemist Polarized Sunglasses from Smith deliver a modern interpretation of a timeless silhouette that lets people know you're smart and savvy. Navy Aqua Fade frames have polarized gray lenses; Root Beer Fade frames have polarized brown lenses. Both lenses block 100% of harmful UV rays and 85% of visible light. Polarized lenses cut glare and reduce eye strain. Handmade acetate frames. Smith Chemist Polarized Sunglasses for women provide a medium fit and medium coverage.
short_description: Design geeks, rejoice! The women's Chemist Polarized Sunglasses from Smith deliver a modern interpretation of a timeless silhouette that lets people know you're smart and savvy.
